user_stories.title: User Registration
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can access personalized features.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter required information (name, email, password).
System validates email format and password strength.
User receives confirmation email after registration.
User cannot register with an already used email.
User is redirected to login page after successful registration.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password to log in.
System validates credentials and displays error for invalid login.
User is redirected to dashboard upon successful login.
User can choose 'Remember Me' option.
User is locked out after 5 failed login attempts.

user_stories.title: Password Reset
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it.
acceptance_criteria: User can request password reset via email.
System sends password reset link to registered email.
User can set a new password using the reset link.
System validates new password strength.
User receives confirmation after successful password reset.

user_stories.title: Profile Management
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are current.
acceptance_criteria: User can edit name, email, and contact information.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
System validates email format on update.
User receives confirmation of successful update.
User cannot change email to one already in use.

user_stories.title: View Dashboard
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view my dashboard so that I can see my account summary and recent activity.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays user’s name and profile picture.
Recent activity is listed chronologically.
Account summary shows relevant statistics.
User can access dashboard from main navigation.
Dashboard updates in real-time.

user_stories.title: Search Feature
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for items so that I can quickly find what I need.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter keywords in search bar.
Search results are displayed in order of relevance.
System supports filtering and sorting of results.
Search is responsive and returns results within 2 seconds.
User can clear search input.

user_stories.title: Advanced Search Filters
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to apply advanced filters to search results so that I can narrow down my options.
acceptance_criteria: User can filter results by category, date, and status.
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously.
Filters can be reset to default.
Filtered results update instantly.
System displays number of results per filter.

user_stories.title: Item Details View
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view detailed information about an item so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can click on an item to view details.
Details page displays all relevant information (description, images, price, etc.).
User can navigate back to search results.
Images are displayed in a gallery format.
Related items are suggested on the details page.

user_stories.title: Add Item to Favorites
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to add items to my favorites list so that I can easily access them later.
acceptance_criteria: User can mark/unmark items as favorites.
Favorites list is accessible from dashboard.
User can remove items from favorites.
System displays count of favorite items.
Favorites persist across sessions.

user_stories.title: Notifications
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive notifications about important updates so that I stay informed.
acceptance_criteria: User receives notifications for account activity.
Notifications are displayed in a dedicated section.
Unread notifications are highlighted.
User can mark notifications as read.
User can delete notifications.

user_stories.title: Admin User Management
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage user accounts so that I can maintain system integrity.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view list of all users.
Admin can activate/deactivate user accounts.
Admin can edit user details.
Admin can reset user passwords.
Changes are logged for audit purposes.

user_stories.title: Admin Item Management
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage items in the system so that I can ensure dATF accuracy.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can add new items to the system.
Admin can edit existing items.
Admin can delete items.
System validates item dATF before saving.
Changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.title: Audit Log
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view audit logs so that I can track system changes and user actions.
acceptance_criteria: Audit log records all significant actions (login, updates, deletions).
Logs are searchable by date and user.
Admin can export logs to CSV.
Log entries include timestamp and actor.
Logs are protected from unauthorized access.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to assign roles to users so that access to features is properly restricted.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can assign roles (user, admin, manager) to accounts.
System enforces permissions based on role.
Users see only features allowed by their role.
Role changes take effect immediately.
Unauthorized access attempts are logged.

user_stories.title: Responsive Design
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the application to be responsive so that I can use it on any device.
acceptance_criteria: Application layout adjusts for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
All features are accessible on all device sizes.
Images and text scale appropriately.
Navigation is usable on touch devices.
No horizontal scrolling is required.

user_stories.title: Help and Support
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want access to help and support resources so that I can resolve issues quickly.
acceptance_criteria: Help section is accessible from main navigation.
User can search help articles.
Contact support option is available.
FAQs are listed and searchable.
User receives confirmation after submitting a support request.

user_stories.title: Session Timeout
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want my session to time out after inactivity so that my account remains secure.
acceptance_criteria: Session times out after configurable period of inactivity.
User is notified before session expires.
User is logged out automatically after timeout.
User must log in again to regain access.
Session timeout does not affect unsaved dATF.

user_stories.title: DATF Export
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to export my dATF so that I can use it outside the application.
acceptance_criteria: User can export dATF in CSV and PDF formats.
Export includes all selected dATF fields.
User can select date range for export.
Exported files are downloadable.
System confirms successful export.

user_stories.title: Multi-language Support
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to select my preferred language so that I can use the application comfortably.
acceptance_criteria: User can select language from settings.
All labels and messages are translated.
Language selection persists across sessions.
Default language is applied for new users.
System falls back to default language for missing translations.

user_stories.title: Bulk Actions
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to perform bulk actions on items so that I can manage multiple items efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: User can select multiple items at once.
Bulk actions include delete, move, and export.
System confirms before performing destructive actions.
Bulk actions are processed efficiently.
User receives feedback on success or failure.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories were generated covering user registration, authentication, profile management, dashboard, search and filters, item details and favorites, notifications, admin management, audit logs, access control, responsive design, help/support, session timeout, dATF export, multi-language support, and bulk actions.
